title: Great apartment in River North-unit offers hw floors and ss appliances
posting_body: Click on: Reply to this listing for more information
** if you are texting us, please include the link to the listing so we can identify what you are inquiring on
Great building in the heart of River North, close to shopping, dining, nightlife, art galleries and more.
Come live in this small 1 bed unit now.

Building offers: -24 hour attended lobby and maintenance -Rooftop deck -Pool & hot tub -Grilling station & fire pits -Fitness center -Pet grooming station & dog run -Lounge & game area -Tech lounge, library and meeting rooms   Units offer: -Hardwood floors -Stainless steel appliances -Quartz kitchen countertops -Sink disposal -Washer & dryer -Wired for 1GB Internet and premium TV programming -Private balconies or terraces (select units)
Take advantage of this convertible unit today!
*****For faster response from one of our Agents, please provide your cell phone number, move date and email address when inquiring.
Availability and pricing may change at any time without notice.
Ads subject to errors and omissions.
Please contact agent for additional questions and information.
